author: Sayed Salahuddin, Susannah George
title: Afghan peace effort inches forward after U.S. threatens to cut $1 billion in aid
description: The Taliban and the Afghan government agree to a partial prisoner swap after weeks of deadlock.
content:
This is a positive development, U.S. envoy Zalmay Khalilzad posted on Twitter, shortly after the Taliban and Afghan government released statements announcing the move.
The signs of progress suggest the threat of reduced U.S. aid nudged the Afghan government … [+4227 chars]
